description: Developers hate inconsistent errors. Define once, use everywhere. Standard error format with error codes, messages, documentation links, and retryable flags provides DX credibility and predictable, actionable error handling.

userStories.title: Create Error Factory
userStories.description: As a platform engineer, I want an error factory so that all services return consistent error responses.

userStories.title: Define Error Codes
userStories.description: As a platform engineer, I want a comprehensive list of error codes so that errors are consistent across the platform.
acceptanceCriteria: KEY_INVALID - API key invalid or expired
SERVICE_DISABLED - Service not enabled for project

userStories.title: Add Retryable Flag
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to know if an error is retryable so that my client can handle it appropriately.
acceptanceCriteria: Each error code has retryable flag
Not retryable: PROJECT_SUSPENDED, QUOTA_EXCEEDED, KEY_INVALID, SERVICE_DISABLED, PERMISSION_DENIED, VALIDATION_ERROR

userStories.title: Update API Gateway Errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want API gateway to use standard error format so that errors are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: API gateway updated to use error factory
Rate limit errors use RATE_LIMITED code
Invalid key errors use KEY_INVALID code
Service disabled errors use SERVICE_DISABLED code

userStories.title: Add Documentation Links
userStories.description: As a developer, I want links to documentation in error responses so that I can understand and fix errors quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: Each error code has documentation URL
Documentation page created for each error

userStories.title: Update Auth Service Errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want auth service to use standard error format so that authentication errors are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Auth service updated to use error factory

userStories.title: Update GraphQL Service Errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want GraphQL service to use standard error format so that GraphQL errors are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: GraphQL service updated to use error factory

userStories.title: Update Realtime Service Errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want realtime service to use standard error format so that WebSocket errors are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Realtime service updated to use error factory
Rate limit errors use RATE_LIMITED code

userStories.title: Update Storage Service Errors
userStories.description: As a developer, I want storage service to use standard error format so that storage errors are consistent.
acceptanceCriteria: Storage service updated to use error factory

userStories.title: Create Error Documentation Page
userStories.description: As a developer, I want comprehensive error documentation so that I can understand and resolve errors quickly.
